text: Vadim Vladimirovich Brovtsev (, Brovtsête Vlâdimire fert Vâdim; , , Vadim Brovcevi; 26 July 1969Ministry of Press and Mass Communications of South Ossetia: Profile of Vadim Brovtsev - 14 November 2024) was a Russian businessmanRussian businessman appointed S.Ossetian premier. Reuters. August 5, 2009 who was Prime Minister of the Republic of South Ossetia from 5 August 2009 President of South Ossetia: Decree on the Head of the Government of the Republic of South Ossetia (5 August 2009)UPI: South Ossetia names new prime minister (5 August 2009) to 26 April 2012, as well as Acting President from December 11, 2011 to April 19, 2012. Brovtsev died from a heart attack on 14 November 2024 at Lake Turgoyak in Chelyabinsk Oblast, Russia at the age of 55. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Presidents of South Ossetia Category:Prime Ministers of South Ossetia Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Vadim Brovtsev
